spirit:component.spirit:name: bd_c5ad_ilmb_cntlr_0

spirit:field.spirit:name: UE_STATUS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates if an uncorrectable error has occurred: 0 - No uncorrectable error occurred. 1 - Uncorrectable error occurred, cleared when 1 is written.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CE_STATUS
spirit:field.spirit:description: Indicates if a correctable error has occurred: 0 - No correctable error occurred. 1 - Correctable error occurred, cleared when 1 is written.

spirit:field.spirit:name: UE_EN_IRQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: Determines effect of ECC Status Register UE bit: 0 - UE bit is not propagated to interrupt signal. 1 - UE bit is propagated to interrupt signal.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CE_EN_IRQ
spirit:field.spirit:description: Determines effect of ECC Status Register CE bit: 0 - CE bit is not propagated to interrupt signal. 1 - CE bit is propagated to interrupt signal.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ON_OFF
spirit:field.spirit:description: Determines if ECC checking is enabled: 0 - ECC checking is disabled. 1 - ECC checking is enabled.

spirit:field.spirit:name: CE_CNT
spirit:field.spirit:description: Holds number of correctable errors encountered.

spirit:register.spirit:name: CE_FFD
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Correctable Error First Failing Data Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Correctable Error First Failing Data Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: CE_FFD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Data of the first occurrence of a correctable error.

spirit:register.spirit:name: CE_FFE
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Correctable Error First Failing ECC Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Correctable Error First Failing ECC Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: CE_FFE
spirit:field.spirit:description: ECC of the first occurrence of a correctable error.

spirit:register.spirit:name: CE_FFA
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Correctable Error First Failing Address Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Correctable Error First Failing Address Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: CE_FFA
spirit:field.spirit:description: Address of the first occurrence of a correctable error.

spirit:register.spirit:name: UE_FFD
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Uncorrectable Error First Failing Data Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Uncorrectable Error First Failing Data Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: UE_FFD
spirit:field.spirit:description: Data of the first occurrence of an uncorrectable error.

spirit:register.spirit:name: UE_FFE
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Uncorrectable Error First Failing ECC Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Uncorrectable Error First Failing ECC Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: UE_FFE
spirit:field.spirit:description: ECC of the first occurrence of an uncorrectable error.

spirit:register.spirit:name: UE_FFA
spirit:register.spirit:displayName: Uncorrectable Error First Failing Address Register
spirit:register.spirit:description: Uncorrectable Error First Failing Address Register

spirit:field.spirit:name: UE_FFA
spirit:field.spirit:description: Address of the first occurrence of an uncorrectable error.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FI_D
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bits set to 1 toggle the bits of next data word written.

spirit:field.spirit:name: FI_ECC
spirit:field.spirit:description: Bits set to 1 toggle the bits of next ECC written.

spirit:component.spirit:description: Local Memory Bus (LMB) Block RAM (BRAM) Interface Controller connects to an lmb bus
